snippet: The Olympic 1,500-meter winner, Asli Cakir Alptekin of Turkey, was charged with doping and could be stripped of her gold medal.
abstract: Turkish distance runner Asli Cakir Alptekin, 2012 Olympic champion in 1,500 meters, is charged with doping and could be stripped of her gold medal.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic 1,500-meter winner, Asli Cakir Alptekin of Turkey, was charged with doping and could be stripped of her gold medal.

headline.seo: Asli Cakir Alptekin Charged With Doping
headline.main: Runner Charged With Doping Could Be Stripped of Gold Medal
